definition[0]: a tall cup used for drinking tea, coffee etc
definition[1]: a large glass with a handle, used especially for drinking beer
definition[2]: someone who is stupid and easy to deceive
example[2]: Only a mug would pay that much for a meal.
example[3]: Something scared him. Probably your ugly mug!
definition[4]: to attack someone and rob them in a public place
example[4]: A lot of people won’t go out alone at night because they’re afraid of being mugged.
definition[5]: to make silly expressions with your face or behave in a silly way, especially for a photograph or in a play
example[5]: All the kids were mugging for the camera.
